summary: Manos returns to his hometown where he finds his children love and starts a chain of events that leads to the uncovering of a dark secret.
cast: Christos Loulis|Fay Xyla|Vladimiros Kiriakidis|Haris Mavroudis|Fotini Baxevani|Dimitris Piatas|Sofia Filippidou|Pavlos Haikalis|Spyros Kitsanellis|Sofia Vogiatzaki|Kleon Gregoriadis|Sakis Boulas|Mara Barola|Manousou Daphne|Margarita Amarantidi|Nikos Bournias|Parthena Horozidou|Dinos Pontikopoulos|Dimitris Voriadis|Olga Dalentza|Kostas Zikos|Eleana Karandinou|Vaios Kotlias|Kostas Kounalis|Giorgos Mitroukias|Antonis Palamaris|Stefanos Pavlou|Giorgos Pefanis|Thanasis Havales|Giannis Psaridis|George Gilson|Eleni Tsaligopoulou
title: Loukoumades me meli
